mapper.select: select a.license_number, a.store_name, a.store_tel, a.store_time, a.address_name, b.img_uuid, b.img_uploadpath, b.img_filename from store a, store_attach b where a.license_number = b.license_number

select a.license_number, a.store_name, a.store_tel, a.store_time, a.store_intro, a.address_name, b.img_uuid, b.img_uploadpath, b.img_filename from store a, store_attach b where a.license_number = b.license_number and a.license_number = substr(#{license},0,10)
select a.*, b.img_uuid, b.img_uploadpath, b.img_filename from store a, store_attach b where a.owner_id = #{owner_id} and a.license_number = b.license_number

select license_number, r_name, max_number, store_status, cate_code, owner_id, store_name, store_tel, substr(store_time,0,5) as time, substr(store_time,7) as time2, store_intro, address_name from store where license_number = #{license_number}
mapper.update: update store set store_name = #{store_name}, cate_code = 'F1', r_name = #{r_name}, store_tel = #{store_tel}, store_time = #{time} || '-' || #{time2}, store_intro = #{store_intro}, address_name = #{address_name} where license_number = #{license_number}
mapper.select: select a.license_number, a.store_name, a.address_name, a.store_time, a.store_tel, b.img_uuid, b.img_filename, b.img_uploadpath from (select rownum rn, license_number, store_name, address_name, store_time, store_tel from store where address_name like #{sido} || '%' or address_name like '%' || #{sigoon} || '%' and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) a, store_attach b where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount} and a.license_number = b.license_number
select count(*) from store where license_number > 0
select count(*) from store where address_name like #{sido} || ' ' || #{sigoon} || '%'

select menu_code, substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate, substr(menu_name,instr(menu_name, '-')+1) as menu_name, menu_price, store_note from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) = (select substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and rownum <= 1)

select substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate, max(rowid), to_number(max(substr(menu_code,(instr(menu_code,'M')+1)))) as menu_code from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' group by substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) order by menu_code

select menu_code, substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate, substr(menu_name,instr(menu_name, '-')+1) as menu_name, menu_price, store_note from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) like #{menu_cate}
